verbose_text: In the present study, the adhesion and migration behavior of VECs (EA.hy926) and the human hepatoblastoma cells HepG2 was examined following addition of a FAK inhibitor; the expression of crucial proteins in the integrin mediated FAK signaling pathway was also investigated in order to determine whether inhibition of FAK may be used for the treatment of cancer, as well as that of other diseases, through inhibition of angiogenesis.
